overview:
“A San Diego native, Dan Halvorson joined the DivX family as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer in June 2007. Dan is responsible for executing all financial and administrative decisions, including providing supply-related support to our operational teams. He brings nearly two decades of finance and accounting experience to the position.

Before setting his sights on DivX, Novatel Wireless named Dan as its Chief Financial Officer and Chief Accounting Officer in 2004. He joined before the IPO and during his tenure, he helped grow the company’s annual revenues from $33 million to nearly $400 million. He served as Director of Finance for Dura Pharmaceuticals from 1998 to 2000 and for Alliance Pharmaceutical from 1998 to 1998. Dan also worked for eight years as a Public Accountant for both Deloitte & Touche and PriceWaterhouseCoopers.

Dan admits that the last videogame he played was PacMan, and looks forward to updating his skills during the Friday afternoon frag sessions at DivX. He enjoys the San Diego lifestyle and spending time with his wife and three children. Dan holds a bachelor’s degree from San Diego State University. Go Aztecs!” (Source: DivX)
